channel.title: Ukrainer In Trier
channel.description: Recent content on Ukrainer In Trier

item.description: CALENDAR OF EVENTS Here you will always find what exactly we plan to spend in the near future! We are always glad to see you at our events! I have to be strong. I have to be brave. I have no right to whine. January 27, 2023 Meetings in the women's circle. Art therapy practices and MAK practices (metaphorical and associative maps). Master class 'Embroidered amulet' February 15, 2023 We invite you, dear friends, to the 'Embroidered charm' master class.

item.title: About us
item.description: HOW DID IT ALL START? The history of our project begins with a burning desire, or rather with several desires: Provide help and support to those who remained in their native land! Do not stay away from the war! Protect the rear! Strengthen the information front! And the idea was born to demonstrate to the world what Ukraine is, how beautiful and multifaceted it is. Fall in love with our Motherland because of its greatest treasures: sincere freedom-loving people, original traditions, folklore, experience!

item.title: Art space / art
item.description: We create exhibitions, historical props. We create and through creativity - we convey our values and feelings.

item.title: Catering/ Food courts/ Fairs
item.description: We convey the entire Ukrainian flavor through creativity and traditional national food.

item.title: Contacts
item.description: Contact us! We are always glad to meet new people! Addresses 54295, Trier Deutschland info@trier-ua.de Telegram: +38 093 0777 210 Opening hours Monday - Friday: 12.30 - 19.30 Saturday: 10.00 - 15.00 Sunday: 10.00 - 15.00 Join us

item.title: Creative team "Free Birds"
item.description: Creative team "FREE BIRDS" The mysterious ancient Trier attracts talented people, binds and unites them. That's right, previously unknown people - were able to become a single incredible team. Music, dancing, singing, creative skills - everything is in abundance. Thanks to the union, we manage to introduce Europeans to Ukrainian culture and folklore. Anna Stetska singer Liza Kondratenko singer, musician Margarita Nagorna singer Angelina Dotsenko singer Sofia Deriguz bandurista, singer

item.title: Educational projects
item.description: Teachers, even far from home, nurture the Ukrainian language and impart knowledge to young children. The educational project "Sunflower" is a real find for every schoolchild!

item.title: Help
item.description: I want to help I need help

item.title: Help in Trier
item.description: Every Ukrainian has the opportunity to ask for help and will certainly receive it. We invite you to visit the psychological support group, which is conducted by a psychologist, coach Anna Plyusnina.

item.title: I can help
I need help
Our Partners
item.description: We are honored to communicate with some of the best people and companies in the world! Why are we saying this? Because only such people and companies cannot stand aside when people are suffering. When you have principles, you have your own thoughts and your own views. If you are willing to sacrifice your own piece of bread for others who cannot buy it. Thank you for supporting us! For believing in our projects and helping to implement them.

item.title: Psychological help
item.description: No one deserve to experience grief, pain and despair alone. Sometimes it's just as hard for others. And it seems that there is no one to share your worries and anxieties with. Because it's bad for everyone. Because I'm afraid to get bored. Many different "Because". But a person needs a person, the one who can withstand the storm of emotions, difficult and unpleasant. And a psychologist can become such a person.

item.title: Ukrainian cultural center
item.description: Ukrainian cultural center Together we create a new story and preserve the old one! + School Children should have access to the same lives as their peers in Ukraine. Many of them will return home - that's why our task is to make a minimal "gap" in knowledge. And school is a great opportunity for children to communicate with each other. + Course, seminars Use new changes as additional opportunities!

item.title: What else do we do
item.description: What else do we do? We try to combine all directions so that everyone who is forced to leave home feels as comfortable and protected as possible. The war goes on - but we must keep dreaming, planning and developing! Organization of rallies and promotions Master classes, seminars Sports and dance sections Organization of excursions and walks Catering and fairs Development of journalism
